overview:
Working as Product Manager for Cloud company Doocuments, Itxaso has just started her career in the Marketing arena.

After completing two Engineering Degrees in her country, Spain, and specializing in Business Marketing in the USA, she decided to have another international experience and went to the UK to work as a Marketing assistant in a couple of industrial companies.

Now back in Spain, Itxaso is working for Doocuments in the University of Deusto, famous for its Technology research and Entrepreneurship programs.
